about_the_game:
Introduction


Lieber, a mimetic weapon made from the fusion of AI and the soul of a good person.
It was called angel, or consumable by us.
And you, as a member of the Self-Defense Forces called Alima,
would replace the full-service comrades who is guarding D23 area.
You took the assigned Lieber and went to the originally calm coast...

How to play

is a photorealistic first person shooting game including sexual contents.
The endings depend on whether you can clear 35 waves of monsters within 40 days.
Lieber provides fire support in the battle. You can upgrade its status by collected energy during intercourse.

Arsenal

There're six equipable and upgradable weapons, which will take extra damage to specific armor type (Shell/Nudity/Metal).
Gatling base doesn't have ammo limitation. You just need to notice its temprature when use it.
Once you clear a wave, you have chance to continue next wave or retreat actively.
Beware if you exit an on-going wave or defeated, only half of your collected energy will be reserved.

Sexual content

Increase cumming gauge by clicking Lieber's body in the "Gym" section.
If one part is touched many times in short time, gauge will not increase.
Switch camera modes between rotating mode and movement mode by clicking "F" key.

content_descriptors.notes:
Garrison One man army
Contains consensual sexual intercourse genital nudity and is not suitable for all ages.
All characters appearing are over 20 years old.

detailed_description:
♥♥ ADD IN WISHLIST!! ♥♥

Introduction


Lieber, a mimetic weapon made from the fusion of AI and the soul of a good person.

is a photorealistic first person shooting game including sexual contents.

Lieber provides fire support in the battle. You can upgrade its status by collected energy during intercourse.

name: Garrison One man army

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 2GHz以上 / Core i7 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050

short_description: Lieber, a mimetic weapon made from the fusion of AI and the soul of a good person. It was called angel, or consumable by us. And you, as a member of the Self-Defense Forces called Alima, would replace the full-service comrades who is guarding D23 area.
